title: Web-Based Distance Software Engineering Education Design

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Delivering advanced software engineering knowledge to pre-service/in-service teachers and supporting adaptation to remote education settings

learning_goals: Learners can design and execute software development projects in remote environments using web-based tools
Learners can propose software architecture improvement plans through peer assessment and formative evaluation
Learners can complete virtual team projects using real-time collaboration tools (e.g., NetMeeting) in BYOD environments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
